title: Final Fantasy VII Remake & Marvel's Avengers Get Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.14.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Get started with your first month of Hims free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

Blessing and Imran take us through a huge news day! Delays, another E3 without Sony, and more. 

Time Stamps - 
00:03:06 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:03:29 - Delays, Delays, Delays
00:14:54 - “How will we survive this?” - Randy Burnt
00:20:39 - PlayStation will not participate in E3 2020
00:29:34 - “WHY ARE PEOPLE PANICKING ABOUT SONY SKIPPING E3?!?!” - Trevor Starkey
00:36:36 - A New Challenger Approaches… Soon
00:37:18 - “What character will we see this time?” - Mike Menjivar
00:46:37 - BioShock: The Collection has been rated for Nintendo Switch
00:50:14 - Epic Games Store Tops $680M in Player Spending Throughout its First Year
00:54:51 - There are new Resident Evil 3 and DOOM Eternal Trailers Out
00:55:29 -  Upstart
00:56:58 - HIMS
00:58:45 - QUIP
01:00:07 - Out today 
 Reader mail   -
01:03:21 - “Do you think there is a high chance for any of the other big releases of the year to also get pushed, such as Cyberpunk?” - Torbannok
01:12:47 - Squad Up: Cody E. - Steam/Oculus - UrMomsNewDaddy
01:13:21 - You‘re Wrong
01:14:58 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Whitta
